wiki.summary: Logic uses “Hallelujah” to open up "Everybody" by giving his take on the world. This album is not purely from his perspective, but he wanted to warm everyone up and set the stage using his own thoughts. The skit at the end of this track begins the concept behind the album, where Atom is walking home and gets killed as a car hits him. He then meets God, who is in charge of leading him into his next life. This track features vocals from Patrick Starr. It was initially teased on Logic’s Instagram story. Read more on Last.fm.
